title: The Cheers logo font
content:
Hello all,  
I know it’s an oldy and I should know it, but can anyone give me the closest font match to the Cheers logo.  
Thanking you in advance.  
B

 [‹ Starbucks Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200921/http:/typophile.com/node/38419 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fenway Park ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200921/http:/typophile.com/node/38415 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elsketcho

comments.content: [No](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030200921/http:/www.chicagobarproject.com/Reviews/Bull/CheersLogo.jpg), it’s probably hand lettered, but it does have a similar gradient fill as Cabaret.
Haha. Ok you can tell I was going from memory. What little is left of that TV show I mean.

The opening credits use Cabaret, so I’m guessing it was custom drawn, then filled to match Cabaret.

- Lex
